title: Chris Cree Brown: electronic composer
creator_credit: Chris Dillon, Hugh McDonald and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: Shows electronic composer Chris Cree Brown recording taped music, discovering sounds in the environment and stressing that one should listen to new sounds in a receptive way. Suitable for secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Chris Dillon, Hugh McDonald and New Zealand National Film Unit
